channel.name: Detroit Public TV US
channel.title: Bee Gees: One Night Only
channel.desc: In 1997, The Bee Gees performed a One Night Only concert at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. This was their only live concert in 1997 and first US concert in nearly 10 years. The Gibb brothers perform their greatest hits from the 60s, 70s, 80s, and 90s including many songs written for and made hits by other artists.
